name: Trouble in Paradise
description: You and your sister are moving to Paradise City for higher education. Both you and her are super excited when you finally move in together. The school is great, the people are friendly (and the girls are hot!) and everything seemed to be going well, until you discover something at school that changed your life forever! The game features unique characters with different personalities. Follow the life of a student, and experience friendships, romance, mystery, and a crapload of lewd-ness!
